name: STAR WARSâ„¢: Shadows of the Empire
description: Installs the GOG version of Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer (setup_sw_shadows_of_the_empire_2.2.0.11.exe).

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars Shadows of the Empire/sesp.exe

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer (setup_sw_shadows_of_the_empire_2.2.0.11.exe).
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars Shadows of the Empire/sesp.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    MESA_EXTENSION_MAX_YEAR: 2003
